Title: Enacts the campus-recognized sorority and fraternity transparency act
Summary: Enacts the "campus-recognized sorority and fraternity transparency act"; requires campus-recognized sorority and fraternity annually submit information on its members and activities to the college or university; requires the college or university to compile such information into a publicly accessible report.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "campus-recognized sorority and fraternity transparency act"
